definitions.definition: A small shallow dish to hold a cup and catch drips.
An object round and gently curved, shaped like a saucer.
examples: The saucer -shaped object could have been a UFO.

definitions.definition: A small pan or other vessel-like food container in which sauce was set on a table.
A flat, shallow caisson for raising sunken ships.
A shallow socket for the pivot of a capstan .

main_definition: A small shallow dish to hold a cup and catch drips.
secondary_definitions: An object round and gently curved, shaped like a saucer.
( obsolete ) A small pan or other vessel-like food container in which sauce was set on a table.
A flat, shallow caisson for raising sunken ships.
A shallow socket for the pivot of a capstan .
